/* USE : PopupMapper.getAgencyList */ SELECT AGENCY_CD, AGENCY_NM FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE P_AGENCY_CD IS NOT NULL
AND (AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} OR P_AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd})
AND AGENCY_CD LIKE '%'||#{srchAgencyCd}||'%'
AND AGENCY_NM LIKE '%'||#{srchAgencyNm}||'%'
ORDER BY AGENCY_CD ASC

/* USE : PopupMapper.getHqList */
SELECT tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tho.OWNER_NM, tho.SYS_STAT_FG, tho.CLS_FG, NVL(thq.ENVST_VAL, '0') AS ENVST_0027, NVL(thq43.ENVST_VAL, '0') AS ENVST_0043, NVL(tcm124.NMCODE_CD, '') AS DIGIT8_STORE
FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE tho, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '0027' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) thq, ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE ENVST_CD = '0043' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) thq43, ( SELECT NMCODE_CD, NMCODE_ITEM_1 FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '124' )tcm124 WHERE thq.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thq43.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tcm124.NMCODE_ITEM_1 (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeCd}||'%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND (tho.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} OR tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = '00000')
ORDER BY tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD ASC

/* USE : PopupMapper.getProductList */
SELECT thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD, thp.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT #{prodClassCd} AS PROD_CLASS_CD FROM DUAL UNION SELECT thpc.PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS thpc WHERE thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH thpc.P_PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY thpc.P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR thpc.PROD_CLASS_CD AND thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) )
SELECT tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD, tmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT #{prodClassCd} AS PROD_CLASS_CD FROM DUAL UNION SELECT tmpc.PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS tmpc WHERE tmpc.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH tmpc.P_PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND tmpc.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY tmpc.P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR tmpc.PROD_CLASS_CD AND tmpc.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) )
